body:
Hello everyone! I apologize for not being active in the forums, and on the server. I am currently on a sick leave, because I caught a fever. Anyways, let's stay on topic, shall we?

I have browsed on the internet for MCPE Master for iOS, because I saw lots of my friends playing with it at school. Of course they were using either Samsung S5, Samsung J5, etc. Then I thought of this. Maybe I should ask you guys this question: Do you by any chance know where I can get that? I really want it, and I am trying to find it but I was wondering if you guys can give me any clues, or hints as to where it is to be found. If you can't, I won't blame you because it is not your fault. Your help will be GREATLY appreciated. Thank you very much, I hope you guys have a nice day, bye! (I might come back from being AFK and play with you guys! YAY!)

title: MCPE Master for iOS 9.3.5

replies.body: It's only availible through Google play for Samsung phones because ios doesn't allow as much modification of files as samsung.
replies.body_tagged: It's only availible through Google play for Samsung phones because ios doesn't allow as much modification of files as samsung.

replies.body: That kinda sucks to be honest....thanks for the help though! I am pretty sure that they will make another MCPE launcher like MCPE Master for iOS very soon. It is possible that it will have better features than that! ;)
